name: sync-calendars
description: Google Apps Script to sync events from multiple calendars

scripts.build: esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --platform=neutral --target=es2019 --format=iife --global-name=GoogleAppsScriptBundle --footer:js="function main() { GoogleAppsScriptBundle.main(); }" --outfile=dist/main.js && cp appsscript.json dist/
scripts.set-up: clasp login && clasp create --type standalone --title "Calendar Sync"
